TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AmbientProperties extends System.Object

summary.span: 为顶级控件提供环境属性值。

span.span: Provides ambient property values to top-level controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 环境属性是控件上的一个属性，如果未设置，则将从父控件中检索该属性。An ambient property is a property on a control that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 如果控件没有父控件并且未设置属性，则控件会尝试通过属性查找环境属性的值 。If the control does not have a parent and the property is not set, the control tries to find the value of the ambient property through the property. 如果该控件没有放置在一起，则该站点不支持环境属性，或者未在对象上设置该属性 ，则 使用其自己的默认值。If the control is not sited, the site does not support ambient properties, or the property is not set on the object, the uses its own default values. 派生自类的某些对象 可以设置属性，即使您不这样做。Some objects derived from the class might set the property even if you do not. 例如， 类始终设置 和 属性。For example, the class always sets the and properties.

summary.span: 获取或设置对象的环境背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the ambient background color of an object.

value.span: 一个 值，它表示对象的背景色。

span.span: A value that represents the background color of an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有环境背景色，则将属性的值 设置为 。If there is no ambient background color, the value of the property is set to .
